# Define Functions

## Load Data

```{r func_load}
get_analysis_results <- function(label) {
  save_name <- file.path(
    save_dir,
    paste0("linear_model_", label),
    "PHC_stats_bacon_interact.csv"
  )
  
  stats_df <- read.csv(save_name)
  
  stats_df
}
```

## Run methylRRA Analysis

```{r func_methylrra}
get_go_biology <- function() {
  m_df <- msigdbr::msigdbr(species = "Homo sapiens", collection = "C5", subcollection = "GO:BP")
  target_ls <- m_df %>%
    dplyr::pull("gs_exact_source") %>%
    unique()
  
  target_ls
}

get_cpg_pathways <- function(cpg_ls, array.type = c("450K", "EPIC")) {
  array.type <- match.arg(array.type)
  
  set.seed(23)
  kegg_df <- methylGSA::methylRRA(
    cpg.pval = cpg_ls,
    array.type = "EPIC",
    method = "GSEA",
    GS.type = "KEGG",
    minsize = 5,
    maxsize = 200
  ) %>%
    dplyr::arrange(.data$pvalue) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(method = "KEGG") %>%
    dplyr::mutate(
      core_enrichment_count = stringr::str_count(
        .data$core_enrichment, "[/]"
      ) + 1
    ) %>%
    dplyr::filter(.data$core_enrichment_count >= 3)
  
  set.seed(23)
  react_df <- methylGSA::methylRRA(
    cpg.pval = cpg_ls,
    array.type = "EPIC",
    method = "GSEA",
    GS.type = "Reactome",
    minsize = 5,
    maxsize = 200
  ) %>%
    dplyr::arrange(.data$pvalue) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(method = "Reactome") %>%
    dplyr::mutate(
      core_enrichment_count = stringr::str_count(
        .data$core_enrichment, "[/]"
      ) + 1
    ) %>%
    dplyr::filter(.data$core_enrichment_count >= 3)
  
  bio_ls <- get_go_biology()
  set.seed(23)
  go_df <- methylGSA::methylRRA(
    cpg.pval = cpg_ls,
    array.type = "EPIC",
    method = "GSEA",
    GS.type = "GO",
    minsize = 5,
    maxsize = 200
  ) %>%
    dplyr::arrange(.data$pvalue) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(method = "GO") %>%
    dplyr::filter(.data$ID %in% bio_ls) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(padj = p.adjust(.data$pvalue, method = "fdr")) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(
      core_enrichment_count = stringr::str_count(
        .data$core_enrichment, "[/]"
      ) + 1
    ) %>%
    dplyr::filter(.data$core_enrichment_count >= 3)
  
  rbind(kegg_df, react_df, go_df)
}

get_stats_pathways <- function(stats_df, array.type = c("450K", "EPIC")) {
  array.type <- match.arg(array.type)
  
  cpg_ls <- stats_df %>%
    dplyr::pull("pvalue_bacon", name = "CpG")
  
  pathway_df <- get_cpg_pathways(cpg_ls, array.type = array.type)
  
  pathway_df
}

get_pathway_annotation <- function(pathway_df, anno_df) {
  gene_df <- pathway_df %>%
    dplyr::select("ID", "core_enrichment") %>%
    tidyr::separate_rows("core_enrichment", sep = "/") %>%
    dplyr::distinct() %>%
    dplyr::rename(UCSC_RefGene_Name = "core_enrichment") %>%
    dplyr::left_join(anno_df, by = "UCSC_RefGene_Name", relationship = "many-to-many") %>%
    dplyr::distinct()
  
  gene_df
}

run_pathway_analysis <- function(
    stats_df, anno_df, array.type = c("450K", "EPIC")
) {
  array.type <- match.arg(array.type)
  
  pathway_df <- get_stats_pathways(stats_df, array.type = array.type)
  
  gene_df <- get_pathway_annotation(pathway_df, anno_df)
  
  list(pathway_df = pathway_df, gene_df = gene_df)
}
```

## Save Results

```{r func_save}
save_pathway_analysis <- function(pathway_df, gene_df, label) {
  write_dir <- file.path(
    save_dir,
    "eQTM_probes"
  )
  
  writexl::write_xlsx(
    list(
      KEGG = pathway_df %>%
        dplyr::filter(.data$method == "KEGG") %>%
        dplyr::select(-"method"),
      Reactome = pathway_df %>%
        dplyr::filter(.data$method == "Reactome") %>%
        dplyr::select(-"method"),
      GO = pathway_df %>%
        dplyr::filter(.data$method == "GO") %>%
        dplyr::select(-"method"),
      Kegg_Genes = gene_df %>%
        dplyr::filter(.data$ID %in% (
          pathway_df %>% 
            dplyr::filter(.data$method == "KEGG") %>%
            dplyr::pull("ID")
          )
        ),
      Reactome_Genes = gene_df %>%
        dplyr::filter(.data$ID %in% (
          pathway_df %>% 
            dplyr::filter(.data$method == "Reactome") %>%
            dplyr::pull("ID")
          )
        ),
      GO_Genes = gene_df %>%
        dplyr::filter(.data$ID %in% (
          pathway_df %>%
            dplyr::filter(.data$method == "GO") %>%
            dplyr::filter(.data$pvalue < 0.05) %>%
            dplyr::pull("ID")
          )
        )
      ),
    file.path(write_dir, paste0(label, "_methylGSA_pathway_analysis.xlsx"))
  )
}
```

## Wrapper Functions

```{r func_wrapper}
run_full_analysis <- function(label) {
  stats_df <- get_analysis_results(label = label)
  anno_df <- stats_df %>%
    dplyr::select(
      Name = "CpG",
      "UCSC_RefGene_Name",
      "UCSC_RefGene_Group"
    )
  
  stats_res <- run_pathway_analysis(stats_df, anno_df, array.type = "EPIC")
  pathway_df <- stats_res$pathway_df
  gene_df <- stats_res$gene_df
  
  save_pathway_analysis(pathway_df, gene_df, label = label)
  
  pathway_df
}
```


## Plot

```{r func_plot}
plot_pathway <- function(pathway_df, title, thresh_fdr = 0.05, ylim = 1e-5) {
  
  plot_df <- pathway_df %>%
    dplyr::filter(.data$padj <= thresh_fdr) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(logp = -log10(.data$pvalue)) %>%
    dplyr::arrange(.data$pvalue) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(
      signif = ifelse(.data$padj < 0.05, "Significant", "Not_significant"),
      ordering = dplyr::row_number(),
      label = ifelse(nchar(.data$Description) < 80, .data$Description, .data$ID),
      label = factor(.data$label, levels = .data$label)
    )
  
  group.colors <- c(Significant = "#6496CD", Not_significant = "#D55E00")
  
  p <- ggplot2::ggplot(
    plot_df, mapping = ggplot2::aes(x = label, y = logp, fill = signif)
  ) +
    ggplot2::geom_col( orientation = "x", width = 0.6) +
    ggplot2::coord_flip() +
    ggplot2::scale_y_continuous(
      expand = c(0, 0),
      limits = c(0, -log10(ylim)),
      labels = function(x) sprintf("%.0f", x),
      breaks = seq(0, -log10(ylim), by = 2)
    ) +
    ggplot2::scale_fill_manual(values = group.colors)
    ggplot2::theme_classic() +
    ggplot2::ylab(expression("-log"["10"]~"(p)")) + 
    ggplot2::xlab("") + 
    ggplot2::ggtitle(title) +
    ggplot2::theme(
      plot.margin = ggplot2::margin(0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, unit = "cm"),
      plot.title = ggplot2::element_text(size = 15, face = "bold"),
      strip.text.y = ggplot2::element_blank(),
      strip.placement = "outside",
      axis.title.x = ggplot2::element_text(
        margin = ggplot2::margin(t = 0.5, b = 0.5, unit = "cm")
      ),
      axis.title.y = ggplot2::element_blank(),
      axis.text = ggplot2::element_text(size = 10, color = "black"),
      legend.position = "right",
      panel.grid.major.y = ggplot2::element_blank(),
      legend.title = ggplot2::element_blank()
    )
  
  p
}
```
